name: Champion Women's Classic Tee
reviews: I have been super impressed with Champion gear as of late. I bought these in both black + white, they‚Äôre both perfect! I like tees to have a bit of a fitted shape so they don‚Äôt look like ‚Äúpajama shirts‚Äù but I‚Äôm not looking for the slim-cut fitted women's style either - these tees hit the mark.I had gained some weight during the first 1.5yrs of the pandemic & in my 30s, I‚Äôm struggling to lose the last 25lbs. So shopping for summer isn‚Äôt always a fun experience as I am not into tank tops as much, don‚Äôt want super tight & uncomfortable tops either. I had also bought two long-sleeve hooded tops from champion & I loved the fit of those so I was banking on these fitting the same. The tees are a mid-weight, good for summer but also good to hold their shape and not cling to your body. I could see my bra thru the white tee but it wasn‚Äôt gratuitous in the least. They hit a bit below my waist (I‚Äôm 5‚Äô5‚Äù) so I can wear them with leggings but I can also tuck in the front a little bit too.I love these shirts & especially for such an excellent price. If you‚Äôre looking for a tee that can be used for all sorts of outfits, these are it. I wore the white tee with navy capri fitted joggers, earrings + necklace, & white adidas sneakers and I could have definitely dressed the top up more - super versatile!TL;DR - 4.5/5 stars - 0.5 star loss due to slight see-thru on the white color tee
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 13 June 2022
